text: [Music]
I've been to all the countries at least
once um I don't buy art in in
Asia uh there was only one funny
exception which I'd like to tell a story
about I was in B Bhutan three or four
years ago and and I was being driven
around in
parro uh by the former head of the
museum in parro and who was a high Lama
manuk
Tuco and uh we were we my wife wanted to
stop at a a store because she was
looking for fabrics and textiles to to
buy for our our shop at the
Museum and this man uh had three or four
to Buddhist paint uh bhan painting
uh and I looked at them and I said this
one here is 19th century isn't it
illegal to bring this painting out of
Bhutan he said yes but nobody's going to
open your luggage don't worry about it
and I didn't want to get in the fight
with him what what would be the use of
it right uh and we bought the painting
and on the last day we were
there uh I made an offering of the
painting
uh to this very high llama and former
director of the museum to to present it
to the
museum and as thank you for everything
that you have
done and uh uh uh he accepted it so
everybody in Bhutan that comes to visit
and we just did a huge uh three and a
half month Bhutan show in New York
everybody in Bhutan uh you know the
prince and the Queen and all the people
know about that story because I think
it's the first time that a
Wester uh bought something didn't take
it out and donated it so we were very
proud of
it there there is a very rich uh group
of artists not rich in the sense of
money but rich in the sense of good art
that um are
painting and uh the museum I think will
have a show in a couple years okay but
that art is owned by my wife and myself
but uh uh I was last this past weekend I
was in Atlanta at a small school I went
to 52 years ago called ogor which has
done show after show on uh Himalayan art
even before Tibetan art even before I
knew they existed and we've done a lot
of shows there and uh they they have 40
three uh contemporary Tibetan paintings
and we were there for the weekend I just
came back late last yesterday afternoon
and it's a spectacular show it's a
spectacular show
